name: Escape Velocity (Schultzika)
description:
This game was developed as a part of 2019 Epic MegaJam by Indecisive Raccoon.

Match against your friends (2-4 players) in a fast-paced, action-packed space fight in Earth's orbit. Push your foes away using a set of skills while staying down to Earth!

Game offers 3 customizable modes:

  • Timed
  • Survival
  • Deathmatch

Not a single asset was created before the event. Sound assets were downloaded from freesound.org
